keyword: calories in a 14 cup of almonds
title: Calories in a 1/4 Cup of Almonds
meta_description: Discover calories in a 1/4 cup of almonds, including protein, fat, carbs, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
h1: Calories in a 1/4 Cup of Almonds
assumptions: Whole, raw, unsalted almonds; approximately 36 g per 1/4 cup serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, roast level, brand, and exact measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 1/4 cup of almonds provides about 208 kcal and 7.6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Salted (adds minimal calories but increases sodium)

faqs.q: How many calories in a 1/4 cup of almonds?
faqs.a: Approximately 208 kcal for raw, unsalted almonds.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 1/4 cup almonds?
faqs.a: About 7.6 g of protein per 1/4 cup serving.

faqs.q: Do almonds have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 18 g total fat per 1/4 cup, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: How much fiber in a 1/4 cup of almonds?
faqs.a: Roughly 4.5 g of dietary fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Are roasted almonds higher in calories than raw?
faqs.a: Slightly if dry-roasted; oil-roasted can add 40+ kcal per serving.
